BOOKS_NOT_FOUND: You don't have any books yet
AUTHOR: Author

HOME_PAGE.MAIN_TEXT: Welcome to our convenient book reading app! Here, you'll find an endless variety of literary works covering all genres and directions. Our app is designed for true connoisseurs of words, craving new knowledge, adventures, and emotions.

TEXT_BLOCK_1.TITLE: Library of Diversity
TEXT_BLOCK_1.TEXT: Hundreds of thousands of books from classics to modern bestsellers. We take pride in offering a wide selection that caters to every taste and interest.

TEXT_BLOCK_2.TITLE: Search to Suit Your Taste
TEXT_BLOCK_2.TEXT: Our powerful search engine will help you easily find books that match your preferences. Filter by authors, genres, ratings, and other parameters to quickly discover the perfect read.

TEXT_BLOCK_3.TITLE: Personal Library
TEXT_BLOCK_3.TEXT: Create your own collection of favorite works. Mark read books, give ratings, and share your impressions with friends.

TEXT_BLOCK_4.TITLE: Always with You
TEXT_BLOCK_4.TEXT: Our app is available on all devices, allowing you to read anywhere, anytime. Data synchronization ensures that your progress is saved, even if you switch to another device.

TEXT_BLOCK_5.TITLE: New Releases and Recommendations
TEXT_BLOCK_5.TEXT: Stay up-to-date with the latest literary trends through our regular updates and personalized recommendations based on your preferences.
